segments.text: Everything in the kitchen seems to be at odds with the peaceful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water is a reminder of the untamed nature of this chaotic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s infuriating to see the woman unaware of the danger lurking so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that little boy, reaching for cookies, his eyes filled with glee, warms my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just so eager to share in the joy of cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she only knew the trouble waiting to unfold, would she still look so content?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel like I’m watching a live-action version of a classic cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR
